neo_ffi_01.LongName: NEO-FFI Q01: Sometimes I`m not as dependable or reliable as I should be
neo_ffi_01.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_12.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_14.LongName: NEO-FFI Q14: If someone starts a fight, I`m ready to fight back
neo_ffi_14.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_15.LongName: NEO-FFI Q15: I have no sympathy for beggers
neo_ffi_15.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_16.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_17.LongName: NEO-FFI Q17: I rarely feel lonely of blue
neo_ffi_17.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_19.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_20.LongName: NEO-FFI Q20: I am better than most people, and I know it
neo_ffi_20.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_27.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_28.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_29.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_30.LongName: NEO-FFI Q30: I really enjoy talking to people
neo_ffi_30.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_31.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_33.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_36.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_37.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_38.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_39.LongName: NEO-FFI Q39: At times I have felt bitter and resentful
neo_ffi_39.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_40.LongName: NEO-FFI Q40: When I make a commitment, I can always be counted to follow through
neo_ffi_40.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_41.LongName: NEO-FFI Q41: Poetry has little or no effect on me
neo_ffi_41.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_42.LongName: NEO-FFI Q42: At times I bully or flatter people into doing what I want them to do
neo_ffi_42.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_43.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?

neo_ffi_44.LongName: NEO-FFI Q44: If necessary, I am willing to manipulate people to get what I want
neo_ffi_44.Description: How well do you feel the statements below describe you?
